SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.util

Class PlayerKeyBindings

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.util.PlayerKeyBindings
public class PlayerKeyBindings extends Object
The PlayerKeyBindings class manages key bindings for player movement in four directions: up, down, left, and right. It provides methods to check if any of the active keys correspond to the movement directions.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerKeyBindings

      public PlayerKeyBindings(Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> upKeys, Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> downKeys, Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> leftKeys, Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> rightKeys)
      Constructs a PlayerKeyBindings object with the specified key sets for movement directions.
      Parameters:
      upKeys - the set of key codes that represent the "up" movement
      downKeys - the set of key codes that represent the "down" movement
      leftKeys - the set of key codes that represent the "left" movement
      rightKeys - the set of key codes that represent the "right" movement

  • Method Details

    • isMovingUp

      public boolean isMovingUp(Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> activeKeys)
      Checks if any of the keys in the provided set of active keys are mapped to the "move up" action.
      Parameters:
      activeKeys - the set of currently active keys
      Returns:
      true if any of the active keys are mapped to the "move up" action, false otherwise

    • isMovingDown

      public boolean isMovingDown(Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> activeKeys)
      Checks if any of the keys in the specified set of active keys are associated with moving down.
      Parameters:
      activeKeys - the set of currently active keys
      Returns:
      true if any of the active keys are associated with moving down, false otherwise

    • isMovingLeft

      public boolean isMovingLeft(Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> activeKeys)
      Checks if the player is moving left based on the active keys.
      Parameters:
      activeKeys - a set of currently active key codes
      Returns:
      true if any of the keys in the leftKeys set are active, false otherwise

    • isMovingRight

      public boolean isMovingRight(Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> activeKeys)
      Checks if the player is moving to the right based on the active keys.
      Parameters:
      activeKeys - a set of currently active key codes
      Returns:
      true if any of the keys in the rightKeys set are present in the activeKeys set, false otherwise
